description: An income support scheme for all landholding farmer families in the country.
benefits: Financial benefit of Rs. 6000/- per year in three equal installments.
eligibility: All landholding farmer families having cultivable landholding in their names.

description: A crop insurance scheme to provide financial support to farmers suffering crop loss/damage.
eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.

description: Government issues soil health cards to farmers which will carry crop-wise recommendations of nutrients and fertilizers.
benefits: Improves soil health and reduces fertilizer cost.
